Currently playing song ends, new song added to empty queue, new song not getting played
issue.body:
#### Steps to reproduce:
- Song is currently playing back
- Queue is empty
- Wait for currently playing song to end (this should result in a "related videos" screen in the player
- Add a song to the queue using the "+" feature
#### Expected Behavior:
- the newly added song should playback (this assumes that no songs have been added to the queue from external sources)
#### Screen Capture

![screen shot 2015-04-13 at 7 05 30 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4147804/7127335/9b16d036-e210-11e4-8d36-1461baf41573.png)

DJ page only
issue.body: you should only have access to the play button if you are the owner and are logged in.  All others should just be able to vote

issue.title: Queue is not updated automatically upon database change
issue.body:
#### Steps to reproduce
- Navigate to dj page on device A
- Navigate to dj page on device B
- Update queue on device B
- Device A's queue is not automatically updated; must press refresh
#### Expected behavior

When the queue is altered in the database, the dj page should automatically update to display this change.
#### Workarounds
- Press the "Refresh" button to manually refresh the queue.
- Manipulating the queue on your page pulls the queue from the database, refreshing it (upvote, add song, etc...)

issue.title: When a DJ presses '+' the text input should have the cursor in it automatically.
video centering is inconsistant on larger screens
On page-load: Default song plays regardless of content in queue
issue.body:
#### Steps to reproduce
- navigate to dj page
- there is a song in the queue
- default song will play anyways
#### Expected behavior

When the dj navigates to his/her page, the system should play the song at the head of the queue and dequeue that song instead of always play the default song. 
#### Workarounds
- Press the "Play Next Song" button to force-play the next song in the queue.
- The default song ends, triggering playback of the next song in the queue.

rename.from: Default song plays regardless of content in queue
rename.to: On page-load: Default song plays regardless of content in queue
